title: Men's Chino Pants Dustin
description: FIT: Slim Fit - normal rise, normal shape, slim leg

COMFORT: The blend of 98% cotton and 2% spandex ensures comfortable mobility with maximum comfort, making the casual chinos by YZB even more comfortable. In addition to the high flexibility, the durable stretch fabric is extremely easy to clean. Whether stone gray, olive or black - the men's Chino Dustin presents itself as an excellent choice for V-neck and jacket or sweatshirt and trainers.

STYLE: With the classic, timeless Yazubi Chino Dustin, men have a hip basic item in the wardrobe that fits a casual look or as part of a stylish office outfit. The distinctive slim fit shape with a narrow leg pattern impressively emphasizes the male silhouette. The elastic cotton stretch ensures a perfect fit.

HIGHLIGHTS: Yazubi Chinos are a trendy option. The model Dustin is equipped with practical side pockets for all sorts of things. On the back, welt pockets and a logo stitching of the men's chino give a strong character to them. Around the waistband with belt loops, closable with zip-fly and embossed button. The Yazubi Chino defines a clean style for a confident look.

CUT: Hard to top is the versatility of the Slim Fit Chinos. Loosely fitted on the hip, the soft flowing material makes the trousers very comfortable. They are the best quality that a man can see and feel. A wardrobe basic that is phenomenally comfortable and perfect for style upgrades.

- fashionable chino trousers Dustin by Yazubi- Fit: Slim fit - normal rise, normal shape, slim leg- soft cotton twill with stretch content- close with button and zipper- with pockets on the front and pockets on the back- with logo badge over one pocket- with a light wash for pleasant wearing comfort
